import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get room status type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types/{statusTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single room status type by ID (for example, Active or Under Maintenance). Use this when you need to resolve a status type reference to a display name.

**Prerequisites**
1. **statusTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types](/docs/api/locations/get-all-location-room-status-types) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomStatusTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List status types and capture the ID.
2. Get the specific type: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types/\{statusTypeId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-location-room-status-type-by-id).

**Minimal Required Fields**: statusTypeId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"statusTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the status type"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Status type retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a single room status type.","properties":{"Item":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Status type for location rooms (e.g., Active, Inactive, Under Maintenance)","properties":{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the status type"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the status type"}},"required":["LocationRoomStatusTypeId","Name"],"title":"LocationRoomStatusType"}],"type":"object","description":"The status type data"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the request was successful"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code"},"Messages":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Status or error messages"}},"required":["IsSuccessful","StatusCode"],"title":"LocationRoomStatusTypeItemResponse"},"example":{"Item":{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":"22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222","Name":"Active"},"IsSuccessful":true,"StatusCode":200}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Status type not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
